name: approve-ci-bot
description: Automatically approve or reject pull requests

GITHUB_ORG.description: The GitHub account or organisation of the repository (i.e. enkidevs)

GITHUB_REPO.description: The GitHub repository to monitor pull requests for (i.e. approve-ci)

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A token generated for the account which will comment on your pull requests (i.e. f7c41472410cacded24090d24f70e98995d8dc55)

URL.description: The URL of this deployment (i.e. approve-ci.herokuapp.com)
